data_processing: Microarray data (.CEL files) were normalized using the justRMA algorithm and analyzed using R-Bioconductor (Version 2.15.3)
extract_protocol_ch1: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 12.5 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Human Genome U133 Plus 2.0 Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
label_protocol_ch1: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 100 ng total RNA (GeneChip 3 IVT Express Kit Technical Manual, 2008, Affymetrix).
scan_protocol: GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000
